lexUnit.name: advance.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: move up on a scale

sentence.text: The announcement stated that `` economic activity has continued to advance at a substantial pace . ''
A flurry of data released Thursday said spending advanced at its slowest pace since April and renewed speculation that the Federal Reserve is poised for another interest-rate cut .
A month ago , the government said gross domestic product , measuring all the goods and services produced in the nation , advanced at a 1.1 percent rate in the April -June quarter .
It advanced at a 5.4 percent rate from October through December , compared with 4.3 percent from July through September .
Manufacturing productivity advanced at a 2.6 percent rate from April through June , slower than the 3.5 percent gain three months earlier .
The economy grew 4.1 percent in 1994 , its best showing in a decade , and closed out the year by advancing at a booming 5.1 percent annual rate in the fourth quarter .

The government reported earlier the gross domestic product advanced at a 2.8 percent annual rate from January through March , much slower than the 5.1 percent rate posted during the final three months of 1994 .
TOKYO ( AP ) --- The Tokyo Stock Exchange 's main index advanced moderately Thursday , rising for the third session in a row to close at its highest level this year .
HONG KONG ( AP ) --- Asian stock markets closed mostly higher Thursday , with share prices in Tokyo advancing moderately to close at their highest level this year .
TOKYO ( AP ) --- The U.S. dollar opened slightly lower against the Japanese yen Thursday , while prices on the Tokyo Stock Exchange advanced moderately in early trading .
Meanwhile , share prices advanced almost across the board in continued strength gained last Friday , dealers said .
The Weighted Index advanced 14.82 points to 7,656.85 .
But prices advanced in the afternoon as investors welcomed the stability of the foreign exchange market .
Applications for building permits --- often a barometer of future activity --- advanced 0.6 percent in December , to a 1.4 million rate .
Meanwhile , share prices advanced in a favorable reaction to an overnight record closing on Wall Street and rising futures prices on Monday 's Chicago Mercantile Exchange , dealers said .
The dollar has advanced against the mark for three-straight trading sessions .
In London , the pound advanced to dlrs 1.5755 from dlrs 1.5710 .
Corn and soybean futures also advanced as record heat baked Midwestern crop lands .
On the stock market , share prices advanced on the strength of higher futures prices on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange in the past two trading sessions , traders said .
The dollar advanced in Europe after Germany 's central bank unexpectedly cut a key interest rate .
On the stock market , share prices advanced on continued buying by overseas investors in early trading and on momentum built up in the four straight sessions of gains registered through Friday .
The Nasdaq composite index advanced 11.80 to 920.45 .
Share prices , meanwhile , advanced in light trading , responding to an overnight record high on Wall Street .

Both bond prices and the dollar advanced in early trading after the Labor Department reported that producer prices rose a modest 0.3 percent in January , lower than the 0.4 percent increase economists had predicted .
HONG KONG ( AP ) --- Asian stock markets closed mostly higher Thursday after a record high overnight on Wall Street , with share prices advancing in Tokyo in brisk trading .
Tokyo share prices advanced in moderate trading in a favorable reaction to the yen 's fall .

CHICAGO ( AP ) --- Soybean futures prices advanced in light trading Wednesday on the Chicago Board of Trade , partly reflecting fears that Hurricane Opal will flood crops in the Southeast and Deep South .
TOKYO ( AP ) --- The U.S. dollar edged higher against the Japanese yen Monday , while prices on the Tokyo Stock Exchange advanced in light trading .
The average price for strict low middling 1 1-16 inch spot cotton advanced 121 points to 109.14 cents a pound Friday for the seven markets , according to the New York Cotton Exchange .
Masahiko Harada of Japan advanced to third with 245.5 points after hitting 95 meters in the second round .
On the Tokyo Stock Exchange , the benchmark 225-issue Nikkei Stock Average advanced 9.99 points , or 0.06 percent , to 17,215.08 points in the first 30 minutes of trading .
The Dow Jones average of 30 industrial stocks was up 1.09 points to 4,755.48 at the close after advancing as much as 42 points earlier in the day .
Stocks have been following bond prices for some time , and advanced to record index levels on Tuesday and again on Wednesday as bonds rose .
The U.S. currency initially advanced in Asia after the Japanese government unveiled a spending package aimed at cutting Japan 's huge trade surplus --- a major cause of the dollar 's weakness .
A 1.5 percent drop in energy prices last month after a 2.1 percent jump in November helped offset December 's 1.6 percent rise in food prices , which shot up after advancing 0.2 percent in November .
Among key sub-indexes , financials climbed 78.77 points , or 0.8 percent , to 9,983.20 while utilities advanced 139.32 points , or 1.4 percent to 10,230.93 .
The index had been advancing steadily over the past 18 months .
But prices advanced in the afternoon as investors welcomed the stability of the foreign exchange market .
No. 5 Kimiko Date also advanced easily , beating Angelica Gavaldon , 6-2 , 6-0 .
